A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Absolute trash. I understand people want new with this series\, but Disney not only goes overboard trying to appease everyone they steal from all the pass movies. From Rays visions causing her to leave her training like Luke in V\, to return of the Jedi with Luke disappearing like Yoda.
